title: The $399 PS5 is Here.
description: The Sony PS5 Digital Edition is priced RIGHT. Xbox Series X unboxing:  Xbox Series S unboxing:   My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  I stream on Twitch now!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
